title: LF support for ranked team
body:
Looking for a support for our ranked team, all that's required is that you're active and have a mic (also must be willing to have a ton of fun) 
If you're interested fill this out.

IGN:
Age:
Skype: yes/no

**Bonus question **

favourite champion:

replies.body:
IGN: spiersie
Age: 21
Skype: yes

Bonus question

favourite champion: hard question, i play all supports however i think THRESH, so much utility, so much to love

IGN: Fire Flareon
Age: 23
Skype: yes
favourite champion: sona 

also have vent ts3 and mumble
can also play a wide variety of other support champions

IGN: R3demption
Age: 20
Skype: yes

Fave champ : Thresh

Only interested in going for gold 1 + 
Not interested in playing with inexperienced people who rarely win laning phase.

IGN: John Cleese
Age: 20
Skype: yes

Bonus question

Favourite champion: support {{champion:143}}

IGN: inprvoingyeti
Age: 21
Skype: yes

Bonus question 

favourite champion: Lee, Leona, thresh, bruam
Is hec a viable support? Wat does hec bring to the team support wise?

> [{quoted}](name=ThatsBS,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=t1oKZLbB,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-19T06:27:04.452+0000)
>
> Is hec a viable support? Wat does hec bring to the team support wise?

I usually just play hec in soloQ/norms when I wanna have fun.. :p I have never tried Hecarim support. I dont think it would work.

IGN: Pony Is Life (going to change tomorrow)
Age: 19
Skype: yes/no Yes

Bonus question

favourite champion: Hecarim/Karma/Thresh, depending on mood, sounds weird.
